name: Randolph William Aarseth II (Bioblaze Payne)
description: Hi, I am an Autodidactic Polymath Polyglot Programmer, I specialize in DRIPP Methodology of Software development, and focus mainly on having fun, making games, and just coding. Over 20+ Years of Programming experience.

name: Dragos Daian (Ughuuu)
description: Hi. I am a Software Engineer who found out about Godot some years ago. I was interested in making a squishy cooking 2d game, but kept finding things missing in the Engine (physics, cloud services, etc.), so I started working on box2D and rapier physics plugins, 2d softbody plugin, etc.

name: Jonathan (jss2a98aj)
description: Hello, I am a gameplay programmer and technical artist with a background in software engineering. Before Blazium was created, I had been maintaining a private fork of Godot for around two years, and had been using Godot for more than five. 3D rendering and C# script support are areas I pay special attention to, as one of the larger projects I work on relies on both.

name: Nicholas Santos Shiden (sshiiden)
description: I'm a partly self-taught programmer who's been working with Godot since 2019.

name: Mounir Tohami (WhalesState)
description: Self-taught (3D Artist, Pixel Artist, and Indie Game Developer).

name: Propolys (rokai08)
description: Hi, Indie Game Developer, worked in game engines like Unity, but came over to the better one.

name: TamashiiDev (PrzyDev)
description: Game Developer for over 10+ years, self taught. Self-taught web developer with stack being the MERN stack mainly. Has led communities with over 5000+ people. Worked on and with the Godot Engine and GDScript for over 3+ years. Currently developing the next indie Monster Taming RPG Game sensation: “Waga Tamashii: My Very Soul”.

name: Subu (inmorgan)
description: Author in game development. When not working on my next game project, I enjoy gaming with friends and writing on the next chapter of my mythos.

name: Luke (Flare199)
description: Hi, I am a Cyber Security & Software Developer who works as a Network Automation Engineer. I enjoy reading and playing video games, especially space games. I have multiple years of programming experience and some time spent in game development. Hope to see you all around feel free to say hello!
